longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry issued to
  nationals of Finland must be valid on arrival. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a National ID Card: 
 - issued to nationals of Finland.

VISA NOT REQUIRED.

Minors:
- Foreign minors (under 18 years of age)
   For more information see
  www.sef.pt
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Finland will be expected to
  hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
- All minors who are nationals of Finland are expected to hold
  their own travel document
